rukus.text: qul innama ana mundhirun wama min ilahin illa l-lahu l-wahidu l-qaharu
rabbu l-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma l-ʿazizu l-ghafaru
qul huwa naba-on ʿazimun
antum ʿanhu muʿ'riduna
ma kana liya min ʿil'min bil-mala-i l-aʿla idh yakhtasimuna
in yuha ilayya illa annama ana nadhirun mubinun
idh qala rabbuka lil'malaikati inni khaliqun basharan min tinin
fa-idha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fihi min ruhi faqaʿu lahu sajidina
fasajada l-malaikatu kulluhum ajmaʿuna
illa ib'lisa is'takbara wakana mina l-kafirina
qala yaib'lisu ma manaʿaka an tasjuda lima khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta am kunta mina l-ʿalina
qala ana khayrun min'hu khalaqtani min narin wakhalaqtahu min tinin
qala fa-ukh'ruj min'ha fa-innaka rajimun
wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnati ila yawmi l-dini
qala rabbi fa-anzir'ni ila yawmi yub'ʿathuna
qala fa-innaka mina l-munzarina
ila yawmi l-waqti l-maʿlumi
qala fabiʿizzatika la-ugh'wiyannahum ajmaʿina
illa ʿibadaka min'humu l-mukh'lasina
qala fal-haqu wal-haqa aqulu
la-amla-anna jahannama minka wamimman tabiʿaka min'hum ajmaʿina
qul ma asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin wama ana mina l-mutakalifina
in huwa illa dhik'run lil'ʿalamina
walataʿlamunna naba-ahu baʿda hinin
